markings:
\"Ibarakiya\", the name of the house that the courtesan seemes to belong to is shown on the red banner, which also suggests that this scene is a \"mitate\" of the famous story at Rsho_mon gate. 
The emblem seen on the man\'s umbrella suggests that the man is likened to Watanabe no Tsuna.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Visual Parody of Watanabe no Tsuna and Ibaraki
